translated: The Group of Three Collections🔽The Chapter on the Well
I praise you in the Kāliṅga country,

analyzed: kāliṅgasmin nimimhase  anna bhaccā cabhaccā ca
translated: with the color of collyrium.”🔽“Those who go forth,
whether for food or for alms,
all of them are not to be refused,
this is the word of the ancient teachers.
I give you this, brahmins, do not come back;
fit for a king, a royal possession, famous;
adorned, covered with a golden net,
with charioteer, go wherever you wish.”
The Garuḍa-Dhamma Jātaka is the sixth.
